meta_title: Downtown Santa Fe Yoga | Plaza District Studios - YogaNearMe

description: Downtown Santa Fe blends 400 years of history with contemporary wellness culture. Find yoga studios tucked into adobe buildings steps from world-class galleries and the historic Plaza.
